Forecasting Package¶

Submodules¶

forecasting_utils.classification_models module¶

This module contains functions for training and evaluating classification models.

forecasting_utils.classification_models.evaluate_classifier(model, X_test, y_test)[source]¶

Evaluate the classifier using test data.

Parameters:

  • model (RandomForestClassifier) – Trained classifier.

  • X_test (pd.DataFrame) – Test feature data.

  • y_test (pd.Series) – Test target data.

Returns:

Accuracy of the classifier.

Return type:

float

forecasting_utils.classification_models.train_classifier(X_train, y_train)[source]¶

Train a RandomForest classifier.

Parameters:

  • X_train (pd.DataFrame) – Training feature data.

  • y_train (pd.Series) – Training target data.

Returns:

Trained classifier.

Return type:

RandomForestClassifier

forecasting_utils.ensemble_models module¶

This module contains functions for ensemble models.

forecasting_utils.ensemble_models.evaluate_ensemble_model(model, X_test, y_test)[source]¶

Evaluate the ensemble model using test data.

Parameters:

  • model (GradientBoostingRegressor) – Trained ensemble model.

  • X_test (pd.DataFrame) – Test feature data.

  • y_test (pd.Series) – Test target data.

Returns:

Mean squared error of the model.

Return type:

float

forecasting_utils.ensemble_models.train_ensemble_model(data, target)[source]¶

Train an ensemble model.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing features and target.

  • target (str) – Target column name.

Returns:

Trained ensemble model.

Return type:

model

forecasting_utils.forecasting module¶

This module contains functions for time series forecasting.

forecasting_utils.forecasting.plot_forecast(model, forecast)[source]¶

Plot the forecast results.

Parameters:

  • model (Prophet) – Trained Prophet model.

  • forecast (pd.DataFrame) – Forecasted data.

Returns:

None

forecasting_utils.forecasting.train_forecast_model(data, periods)[source]¶

Train a Prophet forecast model.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – Time series data with ‘ds’ and ‘y’ columns.

  • periods (int) – Number of periods to forecast.

Returns:

Trained Prophet model.

Return type:

model

forecasting_utils.regression_models module¶

This module contains functions for training and evaluating regression models.

forecasting_utils.regression_models.evaluate_regression_model(model, X_test, y_test)[source]¶

Evaluate the regression model using test data.

Parameters:

  • model (LinearRegression) – Trained linear regression model.

  • X_test (pd.DataFrame) – Test feature data.

  • y_test (pd.Series) – Test target data.

Returns:

Mean squared error of the model.

Return type:

float

forecasting_utils.regression_models.train_regression_model(data, target)[source]¶

Train a linear regression model.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing features and target.

  • target (str) – Target column name.

Returns:

Trained linear regression model.

Return type:

LinearRegression

forecasting_utils.survival_analysis module¶

–

This module contains functions for survival analysis.

forecasting_utils.survival_analysis.fit_kaplan_meier(data, duration_col, event_col)[source]¶

Fit a Kaplan-Meier survival model.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing duration and event columns.

  • duration_col (str) – Name of the duration column.

  • event_col (str) – Name of the event column.

Returns:

Fitted Kaplan-Meier model.

Return type:

KaplanMeierFitter

forecasting_utils.survival_analysis.plot_survival_function(kmf)[source]¶

Plot the survival function.

Parameters:

kmf (KaplanMeierFitter) – Fitted Kaplan-Meier model.

Returns:

None

forecasting_utils.time_series_models module¶

—

This module contains functions for time series modeling using various methods.

forecasting_utils.time_series_models.decompose_time_series(data, model='multiplicative', freq=None)[source]¶

Decompose time series into trend, seasonal, and residual components.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.Series) – Time series data.

  • model (str) – Type of decomposition (‘additive’ or ‘multiplicative’).

  • freq (int) – Frequency of the time series.

Returns:

Trend, seasonal, and residual components of the time series.

Return type:

tuple

forecasting_utils.time_series_models.lstm_forecast(data, look_back)[source]¶

Perform LSTM forecasting.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.Series) – Time series data.

  • look_back (int) – Number of past time steps to use as input features.

Returns:

Trained LSTM model.

Return type:

Sequential

forecasting_utils.time_series_models.sarima_forecast(data, order, seasonal_order)[source]¶

Perform SARIMA forecasting.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.Series) – Time series data.

  • order (tuple) – ARIMA order (p, d, q).

  • seasonal_order (tuple) – Seasonal order (P, D, Q, s).

Returns:

Forecasted values.

Return type:

pd.Series
